result.arabic_text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
result.translation: Ariko baramuhinyuye (ya ngamiya) barayica. Nuko Nyagasani wabo arabarimbura ku bw’icyaha cyabo, ndetse bose abarimbura mu buryo bureshya (baba abakuru n’abato, abakire n’abakene, ndetse n’abakomeye n’abaciriritse).
